title: Analysis of EFL Textbook Language Functions: A Systemic Functional Linguistics Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension skills and understanding of fundamental linguistics concepts
context.additional_context: VR environment analyzing real textbook cases, enhancing collaborative learning through personal device utilization.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze experiential metafunctions (Transitivity patterns) within EFL textbook texts to identify process types (material, relational, etc.).
Learners can evaluate the interpersonal metafunction (Mood structure) in textbook dialogues using the Systemic Functional Linguistics framework to explain communicative strategies.
Learners can visualize lexical collocation patterns in EFL textbooks and derive pedagogical implications through analysis of the textual metafunction (noun phrase structures).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
